mapper.insert: insert into t_g_project_private (id, user_name, project_code, virtual_truck_url,if_virtual,current_branch_url) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{virtualTruckUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ifVirtual,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{currentBranchUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_g_project_private
id,
user_name,
project_code,
virtual_truck_url,
if_virtual,
current_branch_url,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{virtualTruckUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ifVirtual,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.sql: id, user_name as userName, project_code as projectCode, virtual_truck_url as virtualTruckUrl ,if_virtual as ifVirtual ,current_branch_url as currentBranchUrl
mapper.select: select from t_g_project_private where user_name = #{userName} and project_code = #{projectCode}
mapper.update:
update t_g_project_private set
virtual_truck_url = #{virtualTruckUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
if_virtual = #{ifVirtual,jdbcType=INTEGER},
current_branch_url = #{currentBranchUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id}
